Title: Create a 3d image cube in Silverlight 3 using Projection
Description: Create a rotatable 3d cube that reacts to the mouse position on screen, place images on each face of the cube.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Create a rotatable 3d cube that reacts to the mouse position on screen, place images on each face of the cube.

In this example I create a rotatable 3d image cube. The cube is free to move on any axis (x, y or z) and is setup to move based on the users mouse position on screen, moving faster as the mouse moves further away from the cube.
